overview: A making of Nishida Shiori's first solo photobook in her hometown in Kyoto with the theme of "What if Nishida Shiori was not an idol, but a high school girl in Kyoto?". In the photobook, she walks along historic streets, plays the piano in a Western-style building, and plays in the river in a swimsuit. At an old folk house, she strolls around Arashiyama in a yukata. When she leaves the sacred Kyudo hall, she visits the Kamogawa river where the setting sun shines.
title: Nishida Shiori - Shiori
